import React from "react"; import { httpService } from "../../service/HttpService"; import { config } from "../../config/Config"; import { Loading } from "../layout/Loading"; class Warga extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { wargas: [], submitted: false, warga: { NIK: "", nama_lengkap: "", nama_panggilan: "", tempat_tinggal: "", tanggal_lahir: "", jenis_kelamin: "", alamat: "", RT: "", RW: "", kecamatan: "", agama: "", status_perkawinan: "", pekerjaan: "", kewarganegaraan: "", foto: "", foto_ktp: "", created_at: "", updated_at: "" } }; this.addWarga = this.addWarga.bind(this); this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this); this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this); } componentWillMount() { Loading.SpinnerRun(true); httpService.Get(config.routeApi.wargas, null).then(response => { this.setState( { wargas: response }, function() { Loading.SpinnerRun(false); } ); }); } addWarga() { window.$("#addRowModal").modal("show"); } handleSubmit() {} handleChange(event) { const target = event.target; const value = target.type === "checkbox" ? target.checked : target.value; const name = target.name; let _user = Object.assign({}, this.state.user); _user[name] = value; this.setState({ user: _user }, function() { this.validationSubmit(); }); } render() { return (
